thread.title: Watch: 13-Year-Old Girl Rocks Meshuggah On Drums, Gets Kudos From Tosin Abasi And Misha Mansoor [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: 13-Year-Old Girl Rocks Meshuggah On Drums, Gets Kudos From Tosin Abasi And Misha Mansoor [News]

title: Watch: 13-Year-Old Girl Rocks Meshuggah On Drums, Gets Kudos From Tosin Abasi And Misha Mansoor [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 13 hours ago 7 
Guitar masterminds Tosin Abasi and Misha Mansoor - or Animals as Leaders and Periphery, respectively - sang praises of a 13-year-old girl called Alexey Poblete and her recent drum cover of Meshuggah's " Clockworks ." 
"Kids today!? Alexey Poblete totally killing this Meshuggah cover! \m/", Tosin noted , with Misha chiming in via comments section: "Daaamn." 
Young Alexey said she heard about the tune from her Uncle UG J. You can give the video a spin below.
